home.parrafo-info: Graduate in Web Application Development, specialized in software structure and development, from database connections to library optimization or UI optimization for a better user experience.

sobre-mi.title: About Me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a graduate in Web Application Development, with a specialized focus on Full-Stack development.

I grew professionally in a small company, where I worked on all key aspects of development: structure design, backend, frontend, testing, and security.

Thanks to this comprehensive experience, I developed skills in multiple areas. I participated in the development of an application for the company's internal management from scratch. Currently, I specialize in:

- Data analysis and development with Python.

- Application development with PHP.

- Database management and design with SQL and Oracle.

- Version control with Git.

formacion.title: Education
formacion.formacion2: Master's in Robotics and Industrial Automation

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A game where the user must guess the secret word within a limited number of attempts. The word is randomly selected by the program, and the user loses when the gallows are completed.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, showcasing some of my most notable projects, technical skills, and a bit about my education.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An encryptor where the user can enter text, and the encryptor encodes it using predefined keys. The encryptor also allows text decryption.
